reviewDescription: The pTron Fusion Bluetooth Speaker delivers excellent sound quality with deep bass and clear audio. Its multi-playback modes and BT5.1 connectivity make it incredibly versatile and easy to use. The build is compact and durable, perfect for on-the-go use. Overall, it's a fantastic purchase for its price!

This is the 4th Bluetooth speaker I am purchasing online. I have returned one as its battery didn't last for  the time claimed by the company. I started using  this speaker after charging it fully. And I found the battery backup was excellent as claimed in their product description. It was very close to 10 hours. Sound reproduction is not terrific but decent. Normal bass, and the LED RGB  light on the top (which can be turned off) is also very much pleasing. A very descent choice for the price range in which it is offered. One word of caution : If you are looking out for pro quality sound and longer battery backup, better to look for other products. If you are not using it cover it with a dust proof cloth or mink fabric. Especially during winter and rainy season as it can cause serious damge to the diaphram irrespective of any brand.

Speaker's sound quality is quite impressive with balanced bass. Bluetooth connectivity is fast and stable. Unique triangle design and beat synced RGB lights give modern touch. Outer net jacket also gives premium feel. Compact and lightweight. Perfect for indoor and outdoor use. Overall good performance.

reviewTitle: "Misleading Description: No SD Card Slot Found"
reviewDescription: Here‚Äôs a review you can post for the pTron Fusion Mount 12W wireless speaker on Amazon:---**Rating: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ (2/5)**I recently purchased the pTron Fusion Mount 12W wireless speaker, and while the sound quality is decent, I was disappointed to find that there is no slot for an SD (microSD) card, despite it being mentioned in the product description. This was one of the key features I was looking forward to, so its absence was frustrating.The speaker does deliver good sound performance for its size, and the Bluetooth connectivity works as expected. However, the lack of an SD card slot makes it less versatile than advertised.If you‚Äôre mainly looking for a wireless speaker with Bluetooth functionality, it could still be a good buy, but if you were relying on the SD card option, be aware that it's not present in the model I received.

reviewTitle: pTron Fusion Mount Mini Bluetooth Speaker: Underwhelming Performance
reviewDescription: I recently purchased the pTron Fusion Mount Mini Bluetooth Speaker, expecting good performance given its advertised features. Unfortunately, my experience has been quite disappointing.Sound Quality:While the speaker is marketed as having "12W immersive sound," the actual audio performance is not impressive. The sound lacks depth, and the bass feels weak, even at higher volumes. It struggles to deliver clear audio, especially in outdoor settings. If you're looking for powerful sound, this speaker might not meet your expectations.Connectivity:The Bluetooth connection (BT 5.1) was decent, but I experienced frequent buffering issues, especially when connected to devices over a longer range. The signal wasn‚Äôt as stable as I would have hoped, which caused interruptions during playback.Build & Durability:The build quality is okay for a budget speaker, and the RGB lights add a fun touch, but the speaker doesn‚Äôt feel very durable. The buffers aren‚Äôt very strong, which limits its ability to handle high-volume playback without distortion.Battery Life:The battery life was adequate, offering around 8-10 hours of playtime on a full charge, which is as advertised. However, the sound quality diminishes as the battery drains.Pros:Affordable price.Multiple playback modes (Bluetooth, TF card, Aux-in).RGB lighting for a stylish look.Decent battery life.Cons:Weak sound quality with poor bass.Frequent buffering issues.Build quality feels flimsy, especially the buffers.Not suitable for larger or outdoor spaces.Recommendation:Overall, I would not recommend the pTron Fusion Mount Mini Bluetooth Speaker if you're looking for high-quality sound. There are better options available in the market at a similar price range.
